__e: We are the ones who should inherit the earth.
We were spared because we're special because we are the rightful inheritors of the earth.
All because they believe that they are the inheritors of the earth.
I have a will. I need to leave my nothing to someone.
But we got you. Why take a few of his millions when I can inherit all of them and you guys can take the fall?
He will kill the unborn child, then he will kill your wife, and when he is certain to inherit all that is yours, then, Mr Thorn, he will kill you.
